entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:47 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
